title: Defect-balanced active and stable Co3O4âˆ’x for proton exchange membrane water electrolysis at ampere-level current density
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,4196-4204
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00977K, Paper
Chengli Rong, Shuhao Wang, Xin Shen, Chen Jia, Qian Sun, Qiang Zhang, Chuan Zhao
Active and stable noble metal-free catalysts for the oxygen evolution reaction (OER) are essential for realizing large-scale hydrogen production using proton exchange membrane (PEM) electrolyzers.
